summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from a connection with Lake Washington Boulevard South, South of Holgate Street, tothe north line of Yesler Way produced easterly; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5834, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
committee: Finance, City Utilities and Streets and Sewers
